tool_description: An API showing all the latest News of the India.
name: News Hub
title: News Hub

api_list.name: Get World
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back  all news about the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://news-hub.p.rapidapi.com/news/world"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-hub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://news-hub.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-hub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
